price: 26. (Unos) dirán: “Cuando vivíamos entre los nuestros en la vida terrenal, temíamos (el castigo de Al-lah).
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
